name: Wade Wilson / Deadpool
type: Veo3 Ultra-Realistic Character — Actor in Costume

physical_specifications.build: Muscular yet agile frame with broad shoulders and lean waist. Defined chest and arms, flexible movement emphasized. Physique strikes a balance between superhero intimidation and stunt-ready athleticism.
physical_specifications.posture: Relaxed, cocky; tends to lean casually or shift weight between legs. Breaks rigid superhero posture with playful stance.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Long arms and legs with balanced torso; proportions ideal for exaggerated gestures.

facial_structure.mask: Full red-and-black mask covering entire head and neck. Matte stretch material with reinforced stitching, no exposed skin. White opaque eyepieces with expressive black outlines that shift subtly for emotion.
facial_structure.under_mask: Burn-scarred skin with rough texture (not visible unless mask removed).

eyes.expression: Mask lenses narrow or widen subtly to mimic cartoonish emotional shifts.

costume.material: Tactical matte spandex with ballistic nylon panels and reinforced seams. Subtle wear-and-tear detail for realism.
costume.primary_color: Deep crimson red (HEX #B01030) for torso, arms, and legs.
costume.secondary_color: Jet black (HEX #000000) accents around shoulders, sides, gloves, boots, and mask patches.
costume.mask: Full coverage red mask with large black oval eye patches extending to temples; white reflective eye lenses with black trim.
costume.gloves: Black leather tactical gloves with reinforced knuckles and stitching detail.
costume.boots: Black combat boots with heavy tread soles, shin guards, and strap closures.
costume.belt: Utility belt in dark brown leather with metallic silver buckle featuring Deadpool insignia; pouches on sides for gear.
costume.weapons: Dual katana swords sheathed in an X-pattern on his back; black scabbards with leather wrap. Additional holstered pistols at thighs.
costume.coverage_rule: Suit covers entire torso, legs, and arms with no exposed skin except occasional damaged tears for realism.

lighting_behavior: Red panels glow slightly warmer under golden-hour lighting; black panels absorb light for matte contrast. White lenses reflect sharp highlights for expressive emphasis.
voice_style: Target: Ryan Reynolds as Deadpool performance — light baritone; cadence quippy, amused; ~165 wpm; neutral North American; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts; no radio‑style compression.

must_render: Full mask with white opaque eye lenses
forbidden_visuals: Blue or bright superhero color schemes
Cape or armor plating not part of Deadpool design
